languages.text: The psyker assaults the targets with a telekinetic strike, dealing <u>((from 1 to 4) + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> damage and attempts to knock the targets {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}. The targets must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> penalty to stay on their feet.
languages.original_text: Псайкер направляет в цели телекинетический удар, наносящий <u>((от 1 до 4) + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g} / 2)</u> урона, и пытается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуть{/g} цели. Чтобы остаться на ногах, цели должны пройти проверку Выносливости на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g})</u>.

traits.locale_text: The psyker assaults the targets with a telekinetic strike, dealing <u>((from 1 to 4) + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> damage and attemps to knock the targets {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}with a −<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> penalty to stay on their feet.

The targets must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> penalty to stay on their feet.

Чтобы остаться на ногах, цели должны пройти проверку Выносливости на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g})</u>.

Чтобы остаться на ногах, цели должны пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g})</u>.

Псайкер направляет в цели телекинетический удар, наносящий <u>((от 1 до 4) + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g} / 2)</u> урона, и пытается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуть{/g} цели. Чтобы остаться на ногах, цели должны пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g})</u>.

languages.text: 灵能者使用灵能攻击攻击目标，造成<u>（（1到4）+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）</u>点伤害，并试图令目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。目标需要进行坚韧{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受−<u>（5×{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}）</u>减值。若未能通过检定，则会被击倒在地。
languages.original_text: The psyker assaults the targets with a telekinetic strike, dealing <u>((from 1 to 4) + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> damage and attempts to knock the targets {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}. The targets must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> penalty to stay on their feet.

traits.locale_text: 灵能者使用灵能攻击攻击目标，造成<u>（（1到4）+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）</u>点伤害，并试图令目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态。目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受−<u>（5×{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}）</u>减值。若未能通过检定，则会被击倒在地。

灵能者使用灵能攻击攻击目标，造成<u>（（1到4）+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，并试图令目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受−<u>（5×{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}）</u>{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会被击倒在地。

languages.text: 異能者は念力で対象を攻撃し、<u>((1～4) + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} / 2)</u>ダメージを与え、ターゲットを{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}しようとする。ターゲットは、倒れないためには-<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g})</u>のペナルティでTGH{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を合格しなければならない。
languages.original_text: The psyker assaults the targets with a telekinetic strike, dealing <u>((from 1 to 4) + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> damage and attempts to knock the targets {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}. The targets must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> penalty to stay on their feet.

traits.locale_text: 異能者は念力で対象を攻撃し、<u>((1～4) + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} / 2)</u>ダメージを付与。ターゲットを{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}しようとする。ターゲットが倒れないためには<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g})</u>のペナルティで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格しなければならない。

異能者は念力で対象を攻撃し、<u>((1～4) + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} / 2)</u>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え、ターゲットを{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}しようとする。ターゲットは、倒れないためには-<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g})</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を合格しなければならない。

languages.text: El psíquico asalta a los objetivos con un golpe telequinético, causando <u>((de 1 a 4) + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} / 2)</u> de daño e intenta {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribar{/g} a los objetivos. Los objetivos deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de Resistencia con una penalización de −<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g})</u> para permanecer en pie.
languages.original_text: The psyker assaults the targets with a telekinetic strike, dealing <u>((from 1 to 4) + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> damage and attempts to knock the targets {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}. The targets must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> penalty to stay on their feet.

traits.locale_text: El psíquico asalta a los objetivos con un golpe telequinético, causando <u>((de 1 a 4) + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} / 2)</u> de daño e intenta {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribar{/g} a los objetivos. Los objetivos deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una penalización de −<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g})</u> para permanecer en pie.

languages.text: Der Psioniker greift Ziele mit einem telekinetischen Schlag an, womit er <u>((1 bis 4) + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} / 2)</u> Schaden verursacht und versucht, die Ziele {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hinzustrecken{/g}. Die Ziele müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf Zähigkeit mit einem Abzug von −<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g})</u> bestehen, um auf den Beinen zu bleiben.
languages.original_text: The psyker assaults the targets with a telekinetic strike, dealing <u>((from 1 to 4) + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> damage and attempts to knock the targets {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}. The targets must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> penalty to stay on their feet.

traits.locale_text: Der Psioniker greift die Ziele mit einem telekinetischen Schlag an, womit er <u>((von 1 bis 4) + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} /2)</u> Schaden zufügt und versucht, die Ziele {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hinzustrecken{/g}. Die Ziele müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem Abzug von −<u>(5× {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g})</u> bestehen, um auf den Beinen zu bleiben.

languages.text: Le psyker attaque les cibles avec une frappe télékinétique, infligeant <u>((de 1 à 4) + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}FM{/g} / 2)</u> points de dégâts, et tente de {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}paralyser{/g} les cibles. Les cibles doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'Endurance avec une pénalité de −<u>/g(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g})</u> pour rester debout.
languages.original_text: The psyker assaults the targets with a telekinetic strike, dealing <u>((from 1 to 4) + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> damage and attempts to knock the targets {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}. The targets must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> penalty to stay on their feet.

traits.locale_text: Le psyker attaque les cibles avec une frappe télékinétique, infligeant <u>((de 1 à 4) + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}FM{/g} / 2)</u> points de dégâts, et tente de {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}paralyser{/g} les cibles. Les cibles doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'Endurance avec une pénalité de −<u>/g(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g})</u> pour rester debout.

languages.text: Ruhsezer, telekinetik bir hamleyle hedeflere saldırarak <u>((1 ila 4) + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İRA{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} / 2)</u> kadar hasar verir ve onları {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devirme{/g} teşebbüsünde bulunur. Hedefler ayakta kalabilmek için, −<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecesi{/g})</u> ceza puanına sahip bir Dayanıklılık {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmek zorundadır.
